oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Nashville Cats program - Eddie Bayers - 2010-02-13
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Interview program with Eddie Bayers on his life and career from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on February 13, 2010. Hosted by Bill Lloyd.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddie Bayers; Rodney Crowell; Lane Brody
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Includes audio from video and recorded excerpts. Performance includes; Long And Lonesome Highway (Rodney Crowell); Go Quickly By (Lane Brody with Kris Wilkerson);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bayers, Eddie; Crowell, Rodney; Brody, Lane; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
